name: Rolling Cube (itch)
description:
This is a game for Pizza Game Jam. 

This game is about dodging obstacle on a tempo given. The green cube should move to a "safe" area where there'll be no obstacle on it. The higher the point, the harder it get. Well, not hard enough.

For the control player simply moving the cube using "WASD" or arrow keys. Some joystick is supported, but it feel clunky.

NOTE:

Please play this game in 800 x 600 windowed, the resolution is not responsive yet.
